definitions.description: Entity which connects reference data to a specific emission factor or estimation factor, which can determine different factors for large sets of activity data.

constantValues: Entity which connects reference data to a specific emission factor or estimation factor, which can determine different factors for large sets of activity data.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'FactorMapping' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Factor Mapping

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'FactorMapping' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Factor Mapping

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: calculationlibraryid
members.description: Factor library to which the lookup belongs.

constantValues: Factor library to which the lookup belongs.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

constantValues: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

members.name: factorid
members.description: Unique identifier of the factor associated with the factor mapping.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the factor associated with the factor mapping.

members.name: referencedata4id
members.description: Data that supports emissions activity, but it is not the actual quantity of consumption itself, such as the facility name and fuel type.

constantValues: Data that supports emissions activity, but it is not the actual quantity of consumption itself, such as the facility name and fuel type.

members.description: Data that supports emissions activity, but it is not the actual quantity of consumption itself, such as the facility name and fuel type.

constantValues: Data that supports emissions activity, but it is not the actual quantity of consumption itself, such as the facility name and fuel type.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.
